main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[USP_UpdateConsolidationDistributions] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[USP_UpdateConsolidationDistributions]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_UpdateConsolidationDistributions] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_UpdateConsolidationDistributions] ( @DimPoolId bigint, @LTVPassNo varchar(50) ) As Begin SET NOCOUNT ON
--DimConsolidationBalanceDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationBalanceDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationBalance, 0), 2) between cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''CurrentBalance''''
--DimConsolidationLimitBalanceDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationLimitBalanceDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationLimitBalance, 0), 2) between cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''CurrentBalance''''
--DimConsolidationOriginalBalanceDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationOriginalBalanceDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationOriginalBalance, 0), 2) between cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''CurrentBalance''''
--DimConsolidationLTVDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationLTVDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationLTV, 0) * 100, 2) between cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''CurrentLoanToValueRatio''''
--DimConsolidationLimitLTVDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationLimitLTVDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationLimitLTV, 0) * 100, 2) between cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''Current Limit Loan To Value Ratio''''
--DimConsolidationSeasoningDistributionID update tblFactConsolidation set DimConsolidationSeasoningDistributionID = DD.DimDistributionsID from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions DD on Round(IsNull(FC.ConsolidationSeasoning, 0), 2) between 12.00 * cast(IsNULL(DD.FromValue, ''''-99999'''') as decimal(19,6)) and 12.00 * cast(IsNull(DD.ToValue, ''''100000'''') as decimal(19,6)) where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo and DD.DistributionsType = ''''LoanSeasoning''''
End '
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
